subject: FW: Campaign changes and website recommendations

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath

We are working with Harper Digital on Adwords campaign for MoveWell and Physio at Home.

We have just finished the first month and they have come back to us with recommendations on updates we should make to our website to optimise results.

Can you please look at Stewart’s email below and advise if you can make his changes?

Many thanks
Jaqui

From: Stewart Webb <stewart@harperdigital.com.au <mailto:stewart@harperdigital.com.au>>
Sent: Tuesday, 26 November 2019 10:46 AM
To: Jaqui Herman <JaquiHerman@wolper.com.au <mailto:JaquiHerman@wolper.com.au>>; Michelle Stockley <MichelleStockley@wolper.com.au <mailto:MichelleStockley@wolper.com.au>>
Subject: Campaign changes and website recommendations

Hi Jaqui,

After making recent changes on your campaign - I just want to make them aware to you -

We have tried to bring down the cost per click on the mobile physio campaign - this is starting to come down slightly now.
In terms of your website changes:

I've had the team look at your landing pages.

For the movewell page:
Push the classes timetable down
Pull the blue info bar up above the timetable
For the class schedule download - make this an email capture form
Add a quick enquiry form

For the mobile physio page:
Please add a book now button which is a quick form that is able to be filled out
Please add an enquire now button - this is underneath the text box in the middle section with the white background.

The above is a great first start to optimising campaign performance for us!


S
Stewart Webb
m: +614 05 835 572
e: Stewart@harperdigital.com.au <mailto:Stewart@harperdigital.com.au>
Calendar: https://calendly.com/stewart-harper/30min <https://calendly.com/stewart-harper/30min>


______________________________________________________________________
